Title: Punk Hunt | Find them all
Name: Punk Hunt
AboutContent: CryptoPunks are taking over the billboards of Miami. Here's your chance to get involved.
Beginning April 12, CryptoPunks will be displayed on 96 billboards across Miami for one month as part of an exhibition by SaveArtSpace. Earn exclusive rewards by completing 5 Punk Hunt challenges.

LarvaLabs developed the Punks as an experiement, with randomly generated pixelated punks given away for free in 2017. In April 2021, CryptoPunks are headed to Christies' auction house, and more importantly, are set to take over the billboards of Miami.
Check the home page for details on all PunkHunt Challenges.
OneContent: The first challenge will be announced on April 12, 2021.
TwoContent: The second challege will be announced on April 13, 2021.
